author: hship
msg: Re-introduce support for automatic onLoad method for the Body component.
Make the Form component emit a name attribute, to faciliate JavaScript access
to the form and its elements.

author: hship
msg: Minor documentation and JWC errors in the TextField component.

author: hship
msg: Fix a NullPointerException in SimpleApplication.cleanupAfterRequest().  The exception may be thrown
if another exception is thrown earlier in the request cycle (before any page recoders are accessed).

author: hship
msg: Make some changes for recent changes to the Tapestry API.
